rawTask: #TODO:60 As a user I would like to add content to my TODO descriptions from markdown templates stored in my project id:36 gh:138 ic:gh
text: As a user I would like to add content to my TODO descriptions from markdown templates stored in my project id:36 gh:138 ic:gh
description: - [ ] Append templates to tasks with `t:<type>` metadata in them. (e.g. `t:story`)
- [ ] if TODO appears in a single line comment, append template with single line comment prefix and the same indentation as the TODO comment
- [ ] If TODO appears in a multiline comment, just append template at the same indentation as the TODO comment
- [ ] Remove `t:story` after the template has been appended to the description
- [ ] templates.md will contain templates in the format...
rawDescription: - [ ] Append templates to tasks with `t:<type>` metadata in them. (e.g. `t:story`)
- [ ] if TODO appears in a single line comment, append template with single line comment prefix and the same indentation as the TODO comment
- [ ] If TODO appears in a multiline comment, just append template at the same indentation as the TODO comment
- [ ] Remove `t:story` after the template has been appended to the description
- [ ] templates.md will contain templates in the format...
